comments.body: with the new changes to Columnar introduced in 3.0 I wonder if we shouldn't leave this evolving.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -30,7 +29,6 @@
  * batch so that Spark can access the data row by row. Instance of it is meant to be reused during
  * the entire data loading process.
  */
-@Evolving

comments.body: I'll revert the changes to Columnar*
